verses.name: 2 Chronicles 5:3
verses.text: Wherefore all the men of Israel assembled themselves unto the king in the feast which was in the seventh month.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 5:4
verses.text: And all the elders of Israel came; and the Levites took up the ark.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 5:5
verses.text: And they brought up the ark, and the tabernacle of the congregation, and all the holy vessels that were in the tabernacle, these did the priests and the Levites bring up.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 5:6
verses.text: Also king Solomon, and all the congregation of Israel that were assembled unto him before the ark, sacrificed sheep and oxen, which could not be told nor numbered for multitude.
